Class SelectAlienUnitState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.SelectAlienUnitState
public class SelectAlienUnitState extends AdventureState
Represents the state within the AdventurePhase where each player selects an AlienUnit and places it into a HousingUnit on their ShipBoard.

This state is entered at the beginning of an adventure and remains active until all players have completed their alien selection. Once every active player signals completion, the state automatically transitions to IdleState.

Responsibilities of this state include:

  • Allowing each player to select and place one alien unit
  • Tracking which players have completed their selection
  • Enforcing that no player may place more than one alien

  • Method Details

    • completedAlienSelection

      public void completedAlienSelection(String username)
      Marks the player as having completed their alien selection.

      If all active (non-aborted) players have completed their selection, the state automatically transitions to IdleState.

      Overrides:
      completedAlienSelection in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player completing the selection
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player has already completed the selection

    • selectAliens

      public void selectAliens(String username, AlienUnit alienUnit, HousingUnit housingUnit)
      Allows the player to assign an AlienUnit to a specified HousingUnit on their ShipBoard.

      This method is valid only during the SelectAlienUnitState. Each player can perform this action only once, before calling completedAlienSelection(String). Once a player is marked as finished, further attempts will result in an exception.

      Overrides:
      selectAliens in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player performing the selection
      alienUnit - the alien unit the player wants to place
      housingUnit - the housing unit where the alien is to be placed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player has already completed alien selection
